Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C,$P_{C}=1	imes10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{C}=5L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A,$P_{A}=1	imes10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{A}=2L$
